definition: fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
"cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力发电厂的经济性主要取决于电站锅炉的热效率。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流湿式冷却塔的节水是火力发电厂节水工作的关键。

sentences.english: Coal-fired power plants are factories of death.
sentences.chinese: 烧煤的火力发电厂堪称死亡工厂。

sentences.english: The coal conveyer belt is an important transport machine of thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 输煤胶带是火力发电厂的重要运输机械。

sentences.english: A Study of Environmental Protection Problem of Coal-Fired Power Plant;
sentences.chinese: 给煤机是燃煤火力发电厂的重要设置。

sentences.english: Research on Intelligent Control of Coal Management System in Power Plant;
sentences.chinese: 给煤机是燃煤火力发电厂的重要设置。

sentences.english: Medium-speed coal mill is the capital equipment for producing coal powder in thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 中速磨煤机是火力发电厂煤粉制备系统的主要设备。

sentences.english: The economy of the power plant mainly is decided by thermal efficiency of the electricity station boilers .
sentences.chinese: 火力发电厂的经济性主要取决于电站锅炉的热效率。
